keyFindings: reversalRatio is strongest differentiator: Humans 0-0.01, Bots 0.29-0.61
smoothRatio shows huge gap: Humans 0.62-0.85, Bots 0.21-0.37
hesitationRate was counterproductive - bots hesitate MORE than some humans
analyses.expectedImprovement: Reduce false positives from 40% while maintaining 100% bot detection

keyFindings: False positive rate increased dramatically to 71.4% - threshold of 3 signals too aggressive
Strong signals (reversalRatio, smoothRatio, curvatureChangeRate>0.55) working perfectly: 0/14 humans triggered, 11/11 bots triggered
Weak signals with overlap causing false positives: directionEntropy<1.4 (43% humans), xyNoiseCorr<0.10 (57% humans), perfectStartRatio>0.9 (36% humans)
Humans combining 3 weak signals enough to fail, while bots trigger 5+ signals including all strong ones
changes: Relaxed directionEntropy: 1.4 → 1.2 (43% of humans were below 1.4, all bots below 1.25)
Relaxed xyNoiseCorr: 0.10 → 0.03 (57% of humans were below 0.10!)
analyses.expectedImprovement: Reduce false positives from 71.4% to <20% by raising threshold to 4 and relaxing overlapping signals. Bots still trigger 5+ signals so detection should remain 100%.

keyFindings: CRITICAL: Server running OLD code - all 61 results show detectionVersion='unknown'. v1.5.0 changes (threshold=4) NOT active!
Human signal distribution: 0sig(3), 1sig(7), 2sig(10), 3sig(14), 4sig(8), 5sig(1) - with v1.5.0 threshold=4, 14 more humans would pass bezier check
Bot signal distribution: 2sig(1), 3sig(9), 4sig(7), 5sig(1) - 1 bot has only 2 signals but fails on other checks (smoothRatio=0.27 < 0.3)
With v1.5.0: expected 67% pass rate (29/43) vs current 35% - but 5 humans with <4 signals still fail due to OTHER checks (not bezier)
All 15 passed humans have signal counts 0-2; all humans with 3+ signals failed
changes: RECOMMENDATION: Restart server to load v1.5.0 changes
RECOMMENDATION: Investigate why 5 humans with <4 signals are failing (other checks, not bezier)
analyses.expectedImprovement: After server restart: ~67% human pass rate (up from 35%). Remaining failures are due to other checks (curves, timing, etc.), not bezier detection. Bot detection may drop from 100% to ~89% but 1 bot would fail anyway due to curves check.
